product_name: SRAM X9 3x10 Bottom-Pull Front Derailleur - Low Clamp
long_description: Ready for your 3x10 drivetrain, this SRAM X9 bottom-pull front derailleur delivers sturdy, clean shifts across all 3 chainrings. Steel construction stands up to demanding use; derailleur cage performance is optimized for efficient, powerful shifts and little-to-no chain rub in cross-chain combinations. Designed for use with 3x10 cranksets; max ring capacity of 44 teeth. Low-mount clamp fits 31.8 or 34.9 seat tubes (adapter included). Use with bottom-pull cable routing.
short_description: Ready for your 3x10 drivetrain, this SRAM X9 bottom-pull front derailleur delivers sturdy, clean shifts across all 3 chainrings.
